about_the_game:
Step into the chaos of Nine Minute Mayhem, a relentless rogue-like action RPG where the only goal is to survive long enough to snooze an alarm exactly one more time. In order to survive Nine Minutes, you must dive into a dark and hostile world and unleash an arsenal of weapons and special abilities upon waves of enemies closing in on you.

The player controls their character by moving with the left control stick while shooting in the direction of the right control stick. Melee attacks are automatic when enemies get close. Each time you level up during a run, you will be able to choose a power-up: either in the form of a weapon or a passive bonus.

Collect coins each run by breaking crates throughout the world, or by taking out extra strong elite monsters. Survive longer and the monsters become more deadly but the rewards grow richer. You can spend the coins to upgrade your abilities and unlock new more powerful characters. Refine your skills and tailor upgrades to your style of play to become a more powerful warrior.

Play, upgrade, and play again, until you survive Nine Minute Mayhem!

In order to survive Nine Minutes, you must dive into a dark and hostile world and unleash an arsenal of weapons and special abilities upon waves of enemies closing in on you.

The player controls their character by moving with the left control stick while shooting in the direction of the right control stick. Melee attacks are automatic when enemies get close. Each time you level up during a run, you will be able to choose a power-up: either in the form of a weapon or a passive bonus.

Collect coins each run by breaking crates throughout the world, or by taking out extra strong elite monsters. Survive longer and the monsters become more deadly but the rewards grow richer. You can spend the coins to upgrade your abilities and unlock new more powerful characters. Refine your skills and tailor upgrades to your style of play to become a more powerful warrior.

Play, upgrade, and play again, until you survive Nine Minute Mayhem!
name: Nine Minute Mayhem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8300 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 ti or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nine Minute Mayhem is a rogue-like action RPG. Control your character by moving with the left stick and by shooting with the right stick. Gain abilities every time you level up each run, and collect coins to purchase permanent upgrades. The goal is to survive for nine minutes.
